name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vocab Wallet - Your Online Word Bank and Vocabulary Builder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vocab Wallet lets you effortlessly capture new and interesting words as you browse the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ideal for students, writers, and language enthusiasts, Vocab Wallet is the ultimate vocabulary builder and word bank tool.

Key Features:
* Instant Word Capture: Easily save words to your Vocab Wallet with a right-click.
* Seamless Integration: Vocab Wallet automatically gathers definitions, synonyms, and relevant word data in the background, so you don't have to.
* Personalized Vocabulary Lists: Organize words into customized lists for ease of review and study.
* Companion Website: Visit VocabWallet.com to explore curated vocabulary lists and expand your lexicon!

Boost your vocabulary effortlessly with Vocab Wallet, the best tool for capturing and learning new words!
